title: Unable to connect to chat
body: Hi,I've been playing League for a while and just yesterday after i finished a game i got a message at the bottom of my screen saying unable to connect to chat,this is really annoying and i can't see any of my friends who are online i tried checking on my phone but that just doesn't show any of my friends either please help!!! i wanna play with my friends again

replies.body:
Hey IrvingTrejo! 

We're currently investigating the issue. MuffyKing [made a post](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/Nf5ToE3O-client-alot-of-players-from-southern-states-cant-connect-to-client-chat?comment=0004) regarding this issue, and how you can provide more info to help us get to the bottom of this. :]
